trans-unit.source: Specifies events that are reported by accessible applications.
trans-unit.target: 指定由辅助性应用程序报告的事件。

trans-unit.source: The operating system and accessibility server applications generate accessibility events in response to changes in the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统和可访问性服务器应用程序在响应用户界面中的更改中生成可访问性事件。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the accessibility application, search for "Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助功能应用程序的详细信息，搜索"Microsoft Active Accessibility"MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes to expose accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>类来公开可访问的信息。

trans-unit.source: The control plots two curves along with a legend.
trans-unit.target: 该控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。

trans-unit.source: The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control.
trans-unit.target: `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法以提供为图表控件的自定义可访问的信息。

trans-unit.source: Because the chart legend is not an actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 因为图表图例不是实际<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>-基于控制，但改为绘制图表控件中，通过它不提供任何内置的可访问信息。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A>方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示将图例的每个部分的访问信息。

trans-unit.source: When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 当辅助功能的应用程序使用此控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> enumeration with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>枚举<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>完整的代码示例的类概述。

trans-unit.source: An object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.KeyboardShortcut" /> property changed.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.KeyboardShortcut" /> 属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send the event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An object was created.
trans-unit.target: 对象已创建。

trans-unit.source: The operating system sends the event for the following user interface elements: caret, header control, list view control, tab control, toolbar control, tree view control, and window object.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统为下列用户界面元素发送该事件：插入符号、标头控件、列表视图控件、选项卡控件、工具栏控件、树视图控件和窗口对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers must send this event for all an object's child objects before sending the event for the parent object.
trans-unit.target: 服务器必须在为父对象发送该对象之前为对象的所有子对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers must ensure that all child objects are fully created and ready to accept calls from clients when the parent object sends the event.
trans-unit.target: 服务器必须确保所有的子对象都已完全创建，并且已准备好在父对象发送事件时接受来自客户端的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: An object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.DefaultAction" /> property changed.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.DefaultAction" /> 属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统为对话框发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, server applications do not need to send this event for the child objects.
trans-unit.target: 因此，服务器应用程序不需要为子对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Hidden objects have a state of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Invisible" />, and shown objects do not.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏的对象具有状态 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Invisible" />，而显示的对象没有此状态。

trans-unit.source: Events of type <see langword="AccessibleEvents.Hide" /> indicate that a state of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Invisible" /> has been set.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="AccessibleEvents.Hide" /> 类型的事件指示已设置了状态 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Invisible" />。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, servers do not need to send the <see langword="AccessibleEvents.StateChange" /> event in this case.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在这种情况下，服务器不需要发送 <see langword="AccessibleEvents.StateChange" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Description" /> property changed.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Description" /> 属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An object was destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 对象已损坏。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for the following user interface elements: caret, header control, list view control, tab control, toolbar control, tree view control, and window object.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送该事件：插入符号、标头控件、列表视图控件、选项卡控件、工具栏控件、树视图控件和窗口对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: This event may or may not be sent for child objects.
trans-unit.target: 可以为子对象发送或不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: However, clients can conclude that all the children of an object have been destroyed when the parent object sends this event.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当父对象发送该事件时，客户端可以得出结论，认为对象的所有子级都已损坏。

trans-unit.source: An object has received the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 对象已接收键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for the following user interface elements: list view control, menu bar, shortcut menu, switch window, tab control, tree view control, and window object.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送该事件：列表视图控件、菜单栏、快捷菜单、切换窗口、选项卡控件、树视图控件和窗口对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help" /> property changed.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help" /> 属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An object is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 对象已隐藏。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event for the following user interface elements: caret and cursor.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送该事件：插入符号和光标。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send the event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: When the event is generated for a parent object, all child objects have already been hidden.
trans-unit.target: 为父对象生成该事件时，所有子对象均已隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, server applications do not need to send the event for the child objects.
trans-unit.target: 因此，服务器应用程序不需要为子对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event consistently.
trans-unit.target: 系统并不一贯发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An object has changed location, shape, or size.
trans-unit.target: 对象已更改位置、形状和大小。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for the following user interface elements: caret and window object.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送该事件：插入符号和窗口对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is generated in response to the top-level object within the object hierarchy that has changed, not for any children it might contain.
trans-unit.target: 该事件是为了响应对象层次结构中已更改的顶级对象（而不是为该对象可能包含的任何子对象）而生成的。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user resizes a window, the system sends this notification for the window, but not for the menu bar, title bar, scroll bars, or other objects that have also changed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户调整窗口的大小，系统就会为此窗口（而不是为菜单栏、标题栏、滚动条或其他同样已发生更改的对象）发送该通知。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send this event for every non-floating child window when the parent moves.
trans-unit.target: 当父窗口移动时，系统不会为所有非浮动子窗口发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: However, if an application explicitly resizes child windows as a result of being resized, the system sends multiple events for the resized children.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果应用程序调整大小的结果是显式调整了子窗口的大小，则系统就会为已调整大小的子窗口发送多个事件。

trans-unit.source: If an object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Floating" />, servers should send a location change event whenever the object changes location.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Floating" />，则服务器应在对象每次更改位置时发送位置更改事件。

trans-unit.source: If an object does not have this state, servers should raise this event when the object moves relative to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象不具有此状态，则服务器应在该对象相对于其父对象发生移动时引发该事件。

trans-unit.source: An object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name" /> property changed.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name" /> 属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for the following user interface elements: check box, cursor, list view control, push button, radio button, status bar control, tree view control, and window object.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送该事件：复选框、光标、列表视图控件、下压按钮、单选按钮、状态栏控件、树视图控件和窗口对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An object has a new parent object.
trans-unit.target: 对象具有新的父对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A container object has added, removed, or reordered its children.
trans-unit.target: 容器对象已添加、移除其子对象或对其子对象重新排序。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for the following user interface elements: header control, list view control, toolbar control, and window object.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送该事件：标头控件、列表视图控件、工具栏控件和窗口对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event as appropriate for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序在适当的时候为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is also sent by a parent window when the z order for the child windows changes.
trans-unit.target: 当用于子窗口的 z 顺序更改时，父窗口也会发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An accessible object within a container object has been selected.
trans-unit.target: 容器对象内的辅助性对象已被选定。

trans-unit.source: This event signals a single selection.
trans-unit.target: 该事件指示单个选择。

trans-unit.source: Either a child has been selected in a container that previously did not contain any selected children, or the selection has changed from one child to another.
trans-unit.target: 或者是已在先前不包含任何选定对象的容器中选择了子级，或者是所选内容已从一个子级更改为另一个子级。

trans-unit.source: An item within a container object was added to the selection.
trans-unit.target: 容器对象内的项已添至所选内容。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for the following user interface elements: list box, list view control, and tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送此事件：列表框、列表视图控件和树视图控件。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: This event signals that a child has been added to an existing selection.
trans-unit.target: 此事件指示子对象已添至现有的所选内容。

trans-unit.source: An item within a container object was removed from the selection.
trans-unit.target: 容器对象内的项已从所选内容中移除。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for the following user interface elements: list box, list view control, and tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送此事件：列表框、列表视图控件和树视图控件。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: This event signals that a child has been removed from an existing selection.
trans-unit.target: 此事件指示子对象已从现有所选内容中移除。

trans-unit.source: Numerous selection changes occurred within a container object.
trans-unit.target: 容器对象中发生了多次选择内容更改。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for list boxes.
trans-unit.target: 系统为列表框发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: This event can be sent when the selected items within a control have changed substantially.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件中的选定项已发生重大更改，则会发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event informs the client that many selection changes have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通知客户端已发生大量选择内容更改。

trans-unit.source: This is preferable to sending several <see langword="SelectionAdd" /> or <see langword="SelectionRemove" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 最好发送若干 <see langword="SelectionAdd" /> 事件或 <see langword="SelectionRemove" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A hidden object is being shown.
trans-unit.target: 正在显示隐藏对象。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for the following user interface elements: caret, cursor, and window object.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送此事件：插入符号、光标和窗口对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Clients can conclude that, when this event is sent by a parent object, all child objects have already been displayed.
trans-unit.target: 客户端可以得出结论：当事件由父对象发送时，所有子对象均已显示。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, server applications do not need to send this event for the child objects.
trans-unit.target: 因此，服务器应用程序不需要为子对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An object's state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 对象的状态已更改。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event for the following user interface elements: check box, combo box, header control, push button, radio button, scroll bar, toolbar control, tree view control, up-down control, and window object.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素发送此事件：复选框、组合框、标头控件、下压按钮、单选按钮、滚动条、工具栏控件、树视图控件、up-down 控件和窗口对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send the event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, a state change can occur when a button object has been pressed or released, or when an object is being enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当已按下或松开按钮对象时，或者当正在启用或禁用对象时，可发生状态更改。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event consistently.
trans-unit.target: 系统并不一贯发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An alert was generated.
trans-unit.target: 警报已生成。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event whenever an important user interface change has occurred that a user might need to know about.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生重要的用户界面更改且用户可能需要知道这一更改发生时，服务器应用程序就会发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event consistently for dialog box objects.
trans-unit.target: 系统并不一贯为对话框对象发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A window has lost mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 窗口已丢失鼠标捕获。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event; servers never send this event.
trans-unit.target: 系统发送该事件；服务器从不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A window is being moved or resized.
trans-unit.target: 正在移动窗口或调整窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event; servers never send this event.
trans-unit.target: 系统发送该事件；服务器从不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A window exited context-sensitive Help mode.
trans-unit.target: 窗口退出了区分上下文的帮助模式。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event consistently.
trans-unit.target: 系统并不一贯发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A window entered context-sensitive Help mode.
trans-unit.target: 窗口进入了区分上下文的帮助模式。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event consistently.
trans-unit.target: 系统并不一贯发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A dialog box was closed.
trans-unit.target: 对话框已关闭。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event for standard dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 系统不为标准对话框发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers send this event for custom dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 服务器为自定义对话框发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event consistently.
trans-unit.target: 系统并不一贯发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A dialog box was displayed.
trans-unit.target: 对话框已显示。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event for standard dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 系统为标准对话框发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers send this event for custom dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 服务器为自定义对话框发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event consistently.
trans-unit.target: 系统并不一贯发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An application is about to exit drag-and-drop mode.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序将退出拖放模式。

trans-unit.source: Applications that support drag-and-drop operations must send this event; the system does not.
trans-unit.target: 支持拖放操作的应用程序必须发送该事件；系统不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: An application is about to enter drag-and-drop mode.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序将进入拖放模式。

trans-unit.source: Applications that support drag-and-drop operations must send this event; the system does not.
trans-unit.target: 支持拖放操作的应用程序必须发送该事件；系统不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: The foreground window changed.
trans-unit.target: 前景窗口已更改。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event even if the foreground window is changed to another window in the same thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果前景窗口更改为同一线程中的另一窗口，系统就会发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Server applications never send this event.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序从不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A menu from the menu bar was closed.
trans-unit.target: 菜单栏中的菜单已关闭。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for standard menus.
trans-unit.target: 系统为标准菜单发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers send this event for custom menus.
trans-unit.target: 服务器为自定义菜单发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A shortcut menu was closed.
trans-unit.target: 快捷菜单已关闭。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for standard menus.
trans-unit.target: 系统为标准菜单发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers send this event for custom menus.
trans-unit.target: 服务器为自定义菜单发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: When a shortcut menu is closed, the client receives this message followed almost immediately by the <see langword="SystemMenuEnd" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 当快捷菜单关闭时，客户端会收到此消息，其后紧接着是 <see langword="SystemMenuEnd" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event consistently.
trans-unit.target: 系统并不一贯发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A shortcut menu was displayed.
trans-unit.target: 快捷菜单已显示。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for standard menus.
trans-unit.target: 系统为标准菜单发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers send this event for custom menus.
trans-unit.target: 服务器为自定义菜单发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: The system does not send the event consistently.
trans-unit.target: 系统并不一贯发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A menu item on the menu bar was selected.
trans-unit.target: 菜单栏上的菜单项已选定。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for standard menus.
trans-unit.target: 系统为标准菜单发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers send this event for custom menus.
trans-unit.target: 服务器为自定义菜单发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: The system might raise more than one <see langword="MenuStart" /> event that might or might not have a corresponding <see langword="MenuEnd" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 系统可能会引发多个 <see langword="MenuStart" /> 事件，这些事件可能有也可能没有对应的 <see langword="MenuEnd" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A window object was minimized or maximized.
trans-unit.target: 窗口对象已最小化或最大化。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event; servers never send this event.
trans-unit.target: 系统发送该事件；服务器从不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A window object is about to be minimized or maximized.
trans-unit.target: 窗口对象将最小化或最大化。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event; servers never send this event.
trans-unit.target: 系统发送该事件；服务器从不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: The movement or resizing of a window is finished.
trans-unit.target: 已完成窗口的移动或大小调整。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event; servers never send this event.
trans-unit.target: 系统发送该事件；服务器从不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A window is being moved or resized.
trans-unit.target: 正在移动窗口或调整窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event; servers never send this event.
trans-unit.target: 系统发送该事件；服务器从不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling has ended on a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条上的滚动已经结束。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event for scroll bars attached to a window and for standard scroll bar controls.
trans-unit.target: 系统为窗口所附加的滚动条和标准滚动条控件发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers send this event for custom scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 服务器为自定义滚动条发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling has started on a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条上的滚动已经开始。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the event for scroll bars attached to a window and for standard scroll bar controls.
trans-unit.target: 系统为窗口附加的滚动条和标准滚动条控件发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: Servers send this event for custom scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 服务器为自定义滚动条发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: A sound was played.
trans-unit.target: 声音已播放。

trans-unit.source: The system sends this event when a system sound, such as for menus, is played, even if no sound is audible.
trans-unit.target: 系统会在播放系统声音（例如用于菜单的声音）时发送该事件，即使听不到任何声音。

trans-unit.source: This might be caused by lack of a sound file or sound card.
trans-unit.target: 这有可能是由于缺少声音文件或声卡造成的。

trans-unit.source: Servers send this event if a custom user interface element generates a sound.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义的用户界面元素生成声音，服务器将发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: The user released ALT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: 用户松开了 Alt+Tab 组合键。

trans-unit.source: The system sends the <see langword="SwitchEnd" /> event; servers never send this event.
trans-unit.target: 系统发送 <see langword="SwitchEnd" /> 事件；服务器从不发送该事件。

trans-unit.source: If only one application is running when the user presses ALT+TAB, the system sends the <see langword="SwitchEnd" /> event without a corresponding <see langword="SwitchStart" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果当用户按下 Alt+Tab 组合键时只有一个应用程序在运行，系统就在没有对应的 <see langword="SwitchEnd" /> 事件的情况下发送 <see langword="SwitchStart" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The user pressed ALT+TAB, which activates the switch window.
trans-unit.target: 用户按下了激活切换窗口的 Alt+Tab 组合键。

trans-unit.source: If only one application is running when the user presses ALT+TAB, the system raises the <see langword="SwitchEnd" /> event without a corresponding <see langword="SwitchStart" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果当用户按下 Alt+Tab 组合键时只有一个应用程序在运行，系统就在没有对应的 <see langword="SwitchEnd" /> 事件的情况下引发 <see langword="SwitchStart" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value" /> property changed.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value" /> 属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: The system raises the <see langword="ValueChange" /> event for the following user interface elements: edit control, header control, hot key control, progress bar control, scroll bar, slider control, and up-down control.
trans-unit.target: 系统为下列用户界面元素引发 <see langword="ValueChange" /> 事件：编辑控件、标头控件、热键控件、进度栏控件、滚动条、滑块控件和 up-down 控件。

trans-unit.source: Server applications send this event for their accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序为它们的辅助性对象发送该事件。
